name: voby
description: A high-performance framework with fine-grained observable-based reactivity for building rich applications.

scripts.dev:benchmark: cd demo/benchmark && npm i && npm update && npm run dev
scripts.prod:benchmark: cd demo/benchmark && npm i && npm update && npm run prod
scripts.dev:clock: cd demo/clock && npm i && npm update && npm run dev
scripts.prod:clock: cd demo/clock && npm i && npm update && npm run prod
scripts.dev:counter: cd demo/counter && npm i && npm update && npm run dev
scripts.prod:counter: cd demo/counter && npm i && npm update && npm run prod
scripts.dev:playground: cd demo/playground && npm i && npm update && npm run dev
scripts.prod:playground: cd demo/playground && npm i && npm update && npm run prod
scripts.dev:spiral: cd demo/spiral && npm i && npm update && npm run dev
scripts.prod:spiral: cd demo/spiral && npm i && npm update && npm run prod
scripts.dev:triangle: cd demo/triangle && npm i && npm update && npm run dev
scripts.prod:triangle: cd demo/triangle && npm i && npm update && npm run prod
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run compile
